content: Look in the provided 'Entities to use' list and give a comma separated list of {ACTIVITY \ HAS_PARTICIPANT \ ITEM} and {ACTIVITY \ HAS_PRIMARY_PARTICIPANT \ ITEM} triples with only entities in this list.
Entities to use: [use/ACTIVITY, remove/ACTIVITY, bolt/ITEM, engine/ITEM]
Context: Use a 3/8'' socket to remove the bolt and replace the engine.
Entities to use: [move/ACTIVITY, vehicle/ITEM, replace/ACTIVITY, tire/ITEM]
Context: Move to the left side of the vehicle and replace the left tire.
Entities to use: [put/ACTIVITY, engine/ITEM, stand/ITEM, check/ACTIVITY]
Context: Put the engine on a stand to check it
A: [{put \ HAS_PRIMARY_PARTICIPANT \ engine}, {put \ HAS_PARTICIPANT \ stand}, {check \ HAS_PRIMARY_PARTICIPANT \ engine}]
